roleset.name: to settle
roleset.note: ENSCONCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ensconce' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from ensconce.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The former congressman , who [*T*-2] resigned as speaker of the House after an investigation of his financial dealings ,]-1 is ensconced [*-1] in his district office , maintained [*] by taxpayers on a $ 200,000 [*U*] allowance .
example.arg: in his district office , maintained [*] by taxpayers on a $ 200,000 [*U*]allowance
